HEADING: Confirm you're eligible for jury service
MAIN_PARA_1: Your answers in this next section will help us check if you can do jury service or not.
MAIN_PARA_2: You must answer these questions even if you:
MAIN_PARA_3: You can ask for an excusal after this section, if needed.
HEADING_OB: Confirm if the person is eligible for jury service
MAIN_PARA_1_OB: Your answers in this next section will help us check if the person you’re replying for can do jury service or not.
MAIN_PARA_2_OB: You must answer these questions even if you:
MAIN_ITEM_2_OB: want to ask for them to be excused
MAIN_PARA_3_OB: You can ask for an excusal after this section, if needed.
MAIN: Your answers in this section might mean you cannot do jury service. But even if you think you cannot, we still need you to fill in the rest of the online form. We need the rest of the information you give us so we can be sure whether you can do jury service or not.
MAIN_OB: Your answers in this section might mean the person cannot do jury service. But even if you think they cannot, we still need you to fill in the rest of the online form. We need the rest of the information you give us so we can be sure whether the person can do jury service or not.
CAPTION: Eligibility
RESIDENCY_TITLE: Since you turned 13, has your main address been in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for any period of at least 5 years?
RESIDENCY_TITLE_OB: Since they turned 13, has their main address been in the UK, Channel Islands or Isle of Man for any period of at least 5 years?
RESIDENCY_DETAILS_LABEL: Provide details about where you have lived since your 13th birthday
RESIDENCY_DETAILS_LABEL_OB: Provide details about where the person you are answering for has lived since their 13th birthday
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_TITLE: Are you being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act?
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_TITLE_OB: Is the person you're replying for being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act?
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_HINT: Only select yes if, under the Mental Health Act 1983, you're:
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_HINT_OB: Only select yes if, under the Mental Health Act 1983, they're:
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_HINT_LIST_1: being detained (sectioned) or liable to be detained
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_HINT_LIST_2: resident in a hospital due to a mental disorder
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_HINT_LIST_3: subject to a guardianship or community treatment order
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_DETAILS_LABEL: Provide details about how you're being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act
MENTAL_HEALTH_SECTIONED_DETAILS_LABEL_OB: Provide details about how they're being detained, looked after or treated under the Mental Health Act
MENTAL_HEALTH_CAPACITY_TITLE: Has it been decided that you 'lack mental capacity'?
MENTAL_HEALTH_CAPACITY_TITLE_OB: Has it been decided that the person you're replying for 'lacks mental capacity'?
MENTAL_HEALTH_CAPACITY_HINT: This means, legally, you cannot make decisions for yourself.
MENTAL_HEALTH_CAPACITY_HINT_OB: This means, legally, they cannot make decisions for themselves.
MENTAL_HEALTH_CAPACITY_DETAILS_LABEL: Provide brief details about why it was decided you lack mental capacity
MENTAL_HEALTH_CAPACITY_DETAILS_LABEL_OB: Provide brief details about why it was decided they lack mental capacity
BAIL_TITLE: Are you currently on bail for a criminal offence?
BAIL_TITLE_OB: Is the person currently on bail for a criminal offence?
BAIL_HINT: If you're on bail in criminal proceedings, you cannot do jury service.
BAIL_HINT_OB: If the person you're answering for is on bail in criminal proceedings, they cannot do jury service.
BAIL_DETAILS_LABEL: Provide details about your bail and criminal offence
BAIL_DETAILS_LABEL_OB: Provide details about the person's bail and criminal offence
CONVICTIONS_TITLE: Have you been found guilty of a criminal offence?
CONVICTIONS_TITLE_OB: Has the person been found guilty of a criminal offence?
CONVICTIONS_HINT: This only applies if you were given a prison sentence, community order or suspended prison sentence.
CONVICTIONS_HINT_OB: This only applies if they were given a prison sentence, community order or suspended prison sentence.
CONVICTIONS_DETAILS_HINT: For each conviction, give details of:
CONVICTIONS_DETAILS_HINT_OB: For each conviction, give details of:
CONVICTIONS_DETAILS_HINT_LIST_1: the offence or offences you committed
CONVICTIONS_DETAILS_HINT_LIST_1_OB: the offence or offences they committed
CONVICTIONS_DETAILS_LABEL: Provide details about your criminal offence
CONVICTIONS_DETAILS_LABEL_OB: Provide details about the person's criminal offence
